page.title: 09GREAT MEOLS:WORK AND TRAVEL.
page.content: {Data based on a random sample of 100 {households. Of the sample{64%}were engaged in a profession: Teaching/Lecturing{(12%), Banking and Finance{(15%),}Medicine {(4%),}Administration{(20%),}and Management{(13%).12%}of the sample were self-employed.Other jobs included retailing,catering,transport,office work,sales,social work,construction etc.The incidence of unemployment was low,only{4%. {36%}of the sample households had two or more incomes. {100%}of the sample owned a car;{71% using it to commute to work,{15%}by train,{3%}'bus,{11%}bicycling or walking to work. All but{4%}of the sample worked in the Merseyside region,mainly Birkenhead, Liverpool,Wallasey and Moreton.{24% worked locally-Meols or Hoylake.
